name: Neurotrophin receptor TrkB with neurotrophin NT-4/5 in a neuronal-like membrane; replica 1
description: Simulation of the modelled human full-length receptor homodimer TrkB with neurotrophin NT-4/5 bound in the extracellular domains. Glycosylation of the receptor has been modelled as well, and the system has been embedded in a neuronal-like membrane.
authors: Alexandros Tsengenes, Christina Athanasiou, Rebecca Wade
groups: Molecular and Cellular Modeling Group, Heidelberg Institute for Theoretical Studies (HITS), Heidelberg, Germany
contact: For further informations or any queries, please contact mcmsoft@h-its.org
license: This trajectory dataset is released under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International Public License
thanks: This project has received funding from the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under the Marie Skłodowska-Curie grant

interactions.name: Protein-membrane interaction
interactions.selection_1: chain A or chain B or chain C or chain D

interactions.name: Protein-glycans interaction
interactions.selection_1: chain A or chain B or chain C or chain D

interactions.name: Membrane lipid-glycans interaction
